places.name: Nairobi National Museum
places.description: Explore Kenya's rich heritage of art, culture, and history at this iconic museum.

places.name: Karura Forest
places.description: Enjoy scenic trails, waterfalls, and picnic spots in this urban forest reserve.

places.name: Giraffe Centre
places.description: Get up close with endangered Rothschild giraffes and support conservation efforts.

places.name: Bomas of Kenya
places.description: Experience Kenyan tribal culture through traditional music, dance, and architecture.

places.name: David Sheldrick Elephant Orphanage
places.description: Visit baby elephants rescued and rehabilitated from the wild.

places.name: Nairobi Railway Museum
places.description: Discover Kenya's railway legacy with vintage locomotives and historical exhibits.

places.name: Nairobi Kenya Arboretum
places.description: A peaceful retreat for nature walks and bird watching in the heart of the city.

places.name: Kenya Kazuri Beads Factory
places.description: Shop handmade ceramic jewelry while supporting local women artisans.
